>=0.1
<=-0.1
) AS tmp GROUP BY tmp.time ORDER BY tmp.time ASC

SELECT tmp2.title as title, COUNT(*) as count FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN tmp.updown > 0.07 THEN '>%7' WHEN tmp.updown > 0.05 AND tmp.updown <= 0.07 THEN '5~7%' WHEN tmp.updown > 0.03 AND tmp.updown <= 0.05 THEN '3~5%' WHEN tmp.updown > 0 AND tmp.updown <= 0.03 THEN '0~3%' WHEN tmp.updown > -0.03 AND tmp.updown <= 0 THEN '-3~0%' WHEN tmp.updown > -0.05 AND tmp.updown <= -0.03 THEN '-5~-3%' WHEN tmp.updown > -0.07 AND tmp.updown <= -0.05 THEN '-7~-5%' ELSE '<-7%' END 'title' FROM ( SELECT (cur_price - open_price)/ open_price AS updown FROM stock_rt_info AS sri WHERE cur_time = #{curDate} ) AS tmp ) AS tmp2 GROUP BY tmp2.title
